name: Walk the Human
description:
Walk the Human Playable on PC, MAC and most Mobile Devices

You are taking your human for a walk, you are joined with a leash.

Click/Touch where you want to move. You may pull your human to points of interest. Your leash isn't very strong, pull enough and you may be able to break it.

Score by:

  • Getting Bones
  • Chasing Ducks
  • Walking with your human
  • Running off the leash

Lose Points by: 

  • Dragging or being dragged by your human
  • Getting caught or pulled closer by your human

See how high of a score you can get!

Made with love for the GMTK jam 2021.  Theme is joined together.

This game was built using a custom Javascript/Typescript engine that I created. If you are interested in it reach out to me and I can link you to the repo.
